pages.text: O-Cows drop lots of meat, leather, and bones. Cows can be milked to make cheese. $(br2)O-Cows naturally run from O-Horses, and herd with eachother. You can use this to your advantage to drive up to 8 cattle in a herd with your horse.
The milking cooldown on normal O-Cows is 40 minutes, whilst dairy breed cooldowns are 10 minutes.
